revised_title: Asymptotic Expansions of a Class of Integrals: A Simplified Approach
tldr: The article presents a method for finding asymptotic expansions of a class of integrals with weak assumptions on the behavior of pseudofunctions. The derived results recover conclusions from previous papers and extend Hadamard's concept of the finite part in the sense of the integration. The study is restricted to real values, and the expansion method is demonstrated in a simplified context.
